Envía un mensaje de texto a un número

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["number","text"],"properties":{"number":{"type":"string","example":"51929088138"},"text":{"type":"string","example":"Hola desde la API"}},"title":"SendTextRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
